description:
What is it: Defines Azure's password reset policy and which Azure AD groups it applies to. 
 Simeon Notes: This allows users to reset their password or unlock their Azure account. Simeon's baseline applies the password reset policy to members of the group 'BUILTIN - Microsoft 365 Users'. 
 Learn More: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/authentication/concept-sspr-howitworks
